changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_info ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, second_name VARCHAR(255), third_name VARCHAR(255), nick_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, user_id BIGINT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_user_info_user_id FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(id) );
